original_title: How to Get Tough Stains Out of Hardwood
overview: Following the no-fuss killing of her husband, The Housewife must confront the final barrier between her and the calm, tidy life she’s always wanted - a rather persistent blood stain remains on her hardwood floor, haunting her thoughts and dripping on her forehead.

production_companies.name: The University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa

title: How to Get Tough Stains Out of Hardwood
